alert.note: Alert for Northern Trinity; Southern Humboldt Interior; Southern Trinity; Southwestern Humboldt (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 06 at 2:08AM PST until March 08 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TUESDAY TO 4 AM PST WEDNESDAY ABOVE 1500 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected above 1500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 12 inches. Light snow accumulation possible to as low as 500 feet in Trinity County Tuesday morning. * WHERE...Southwestern Humboldt, Southern Humboldt Interior, Northern Trinity and Southern Trinity Counties. * WHEN...From 10 AM Tuesday to 4 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state of California can be obtained by calling 1-800-GAS-ROAD.

area.areaDesc: Northern Trinity; Southern Humboldt Interior; Southern Trinity; Southwestern Humboldt
